軵字的基本解释

軵
rǒng
推：“厮徒马圉，軵车奉饷。”

軵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǒng］［fǔ］
［《廣韻》而隴切，上腫，日。］
［《字彙補》斐古切］
推，推运。
[②]［róng］
［《字彙補》人冬切］
挤。
[③]［fù］
［《集韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
(1)车厢外的立木。
(2)辅。

軵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1242第05
【廣韻】【正韻】而隴切【集韻】【韻會】乳勇切，?音冗。【說文】反推車，令有所付也。一曰輕車。【前漢·馮奉世傳】再三發軵。　又【集韻】斐古切，音拊。推也。【淮南子·覽㝠訓】軵車奉饢。　又人冬切，音近茸。擠也。【淮南子·氾論訓】相戲以刃者，太祖軵其肘。又【說林訓】傾者易覆，倚者易軵也。【集韻】或作?。俗作?。

軵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
軵字的起名意思

暂无。

軵
Basic explanation of words
軵
rǒng
Tweet: "Students, Ma Cheng, and chariots are paid."
軵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rǒng] [fǔ]
["Guangyun" and Long cut, swollen on the top, day. ]
[Fei Guqie of "Zihuibu"]
Push, push luck.
[②]［róng］
["Zihuibu" Ren Dongqie]
squeeze.
[③]［fù］
["Jiyun" Fu Yuqie, Quyu, Feng. ]
(1) Standing timber outside the carriage.
(2) Supplement.
軵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1242 No. 05
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] and Long Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Milky and courageous cutting, with redundant sound. [Said the text] Reverse the cart, order to pay. One is a light car. [Previous Han·Feng Fengshi Biography] Repeatedly garlanded.　[Jiyun] Fei Guqi, sound twist. Push also. 【Huainanzi·Lan 㝠 Xun】The chariot and the honour.　It's another winter cut, the sound is close to velvet. Squeeze too. [Huainanzi·Fanlunxun] Those who play with the blade, Taizu has his elbow. Also [Speaking of Lin Xun] It’s easy to overthrow those who are inclined, and those who rely on it are easy to turn. [Ji Yun] Or make?. Popular work?.
